sections.heading: AUTHORITY OVER THE PROPERTY OF THE CHILDArt
sections.text: 229. Administration of the property of the childEach parent has the right and the obligation to administer the property of the child. The parent must do so as a prudent administrator and is answerable for any damage caused by his fraud, fault, default, or
